title: Buying T209-2 Contentnea and H801-7 Old Mill Cabinets
author: noelbrian55

posts.post_title: Buying T209-2 Contentnea and H801-7 Old Mill Cabinets
posts.post_content:
Working my way through the T209’2 black and white photo set. Would love any leads.  

Also, interested in any other pre-war Carolina or Virginia League cards.

[quote name="noelbrian55" post=2517930]Working my way through the T209’2 black and white photo set. Would love any leads.  

Also, interested in any other pre-war Carolina or Virginia League cards.[/QUOTE]

Best of luck.   I too am trying to collect any and all Raleigh team cards from T209-1 and T209-2 or any cabinets.

I have these T109-2:
Bigbie (Raleigh) SGC 1.5  
Brandon (Lynchburg) B  
Fogarty (W-Salem) SGC A  
Jobson (Raleigh) SGC 1  

Also H801-7 
Walters SGC 1.5. 

I'm out of town until Memorial Day early afternoon after which I can send scans. Please PM with questions. 

Cheers,
Mike

Michael, thanks for responding.  I need three of those T209-2’s and definitely interested in the H801-7.  

I’ll send you an email.  Hope all is well for you.
